1110101101100100 1100001001100011 1 -> sum: 1010110111001000, cout: 1
0101001100011000 1010010011101010 1 -> sum: 1111100000000011, cout: 0
1100010011001001 1011110000000110 0 -> sum: 1000000011001111, cout: 1

0100110011000101 1010000100010011 0 -> sum: 1110110111011000, cout: 0
1101011001110010 0001001010011010 0 -> sum: 1110100100001100, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
